Description.Text:
Position The Hotel Ambasciatori Terme is situated in a calm area at a short distance to the thermal plant of Cervia. 1500 mt distance from the centre of Milano Marittima.
Restaurant Restaurant with air conditioning.
More Informations Last refurbishment: 2011.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. During the meals: choice between 3 men√πs with mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
The prices includes: unlimited mineral water to the meals + beach services with one sun umbrella and one sun bed per adult person, use of turkish bath and fitness area, 1 coupon of 20 Euro per person to use for beauty treatments in the beauty centre of the hotel, free shuttle service to the beach and back to the hotel + discount of the 50% of the entrance ticket to the Thermal Swimming pool of the famous Thalasso Therapy of Cervia (at 200 mt).
Only for who books a journey of min 7 nights, has included: 1 entrance per person to the "house of butterfly" + visit to the "Saline di Cervia" + Kit of salt of Cervia.
Accepted credit cards: Eurocard + Mastercard + Visa.
Swimming Pool open from 08/06/13 to 08/09/13 (from 9.30 to 12.30 and from 15.00 to 19.00).
The hotel organizes theme evenings from 25/05/13 to 08/09/13 once a week. Typical Dinner from 25/05/13 to 08/09/13 once a week.
Check In: from 14.00. Check Out: until 10.00.
